subject: Mathematics
question_text: Find the domain of the function $f(x) = \ln(x^2 - 4)$.
markscheme:
1. Inside ln must be positive: $x^2 - 4 > 0$ [1]
2. $(x+2)(x-2) > 0$ [1]
3. x < -2 or x > 2 [1]
